game_description: Turn on Sport Mode to take it to the next level of VR physics interaction where your creativity is the limit. KEY FEATURES Physics Driven - Realistic physics to create a visceral connection between you and the virtual world. Arena Mode - Fight off waves of enemies for the highest score. Sandbox Mode - A button press away from spawning and manipulating a variety of weapons, NPCs, and props. Sandbox Modifiers - Customize the experience to your liking with customizable strength and speed, dismemberment, oil splatter, time stop, a jetpack, and much more. Coming Soon - New levels, modes, weapons, tools, props, modifiers, and vehicles will be added over time.

review_2: This game is incredibly fun in the sense that it makes me understandably angry, but I have a blast while doing it. I only got this game because BoneLab is taking so dang long, but this is a wonderful sub while Stress Level Zero gets their rear in gear. Some suggestions: Add blood when you stab a dummy, not just decapitate them. Be able to stab someone with an empty healing shot, not just a full one. Knife. Higher hatchet damage Lockers Human dummies. I do get the feeling that sales for this game are gonna TANK when BoneLab comes out, but this game will hold a special place in my heart forever

review_4: I really like this, it was good and works like bonelab and bonework, 10 out of 10, but it be really good with mods, a frying pan, a story mode, more guns, multiplayer, explosives, more maps, cosmetics, and a laying down animation, you press b and you crouch, hold b you lay down.
review_5: Very good and cool game, here are some suggestions:cars/vehicles, more gun options, more gun customization like scopes and extended mags and better blood/ink the blood should be customizable like to change the colour and more of a budget cuts type blood so the blood spews out instead of drips.
